root: ^Me: yes, hello I am here, FRIEND is that you?!?!
^friend: PLAYERNAME? Where are you? What is this place?
^Me: I don't know… [camera pans to the world?]… it feels familiar. I know these woods from somewhere
^friend: Wait isn't this the game we were just playing? How did this happen? How are we here?
^Me: I hate to admit it, but I think were somewhere inside of GAMENAME
^friend: *panic* oh god they're coming from the darkness, theres so many *gun shots* [either through walkie talkie or distant]
^Me: FRIENDNAME are you okay? Where are you? FRIENDNAME! WHERE ARE YOU
^Me: "He said something was coming from the darkness? But what?"
^"I need to figure out where he is and help him"
